Zamavus “Zama’ Magudulela bụ onye si South Africa na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-agụ egwu nke rụrụ ọrụ Rafiki na Paris na Madrid nke The Lion King musical.
Magudulela tolitere na Durban wee malite ịbụ abụ mgbe ọ dị afọ itoolu. Ọ bụ onye otu ukwe ozioma obodo Umlazi tupu ọ banye na otu ukwe na kọleji ya, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na abụọ.
O nwere nzere na njikwa na azụmahịa.
Ọrụ mbụ Magudulela rụrụ bụ na mmepụta nke Mbongeni Ngema nke The Zulu Show wee bụrụ onye na-akwado egwu maka abọm Ngema bụ Isimukanandwendwe na Baba kaMdudu
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-akwado Busi Mhlongo tupu ọ gaa nyocha maka egwu The Lion King na Melbourne n'afọ 2003 wee bụrụ onye nke ngosi agwa  Rafiki shaman.
N'afọ 2006, ọ sonyeere The Lion King cast na Hamburg, ka dị ka Rafiki understudy, ma mesịa sonye na Paris cast dị ka Rafika Onye isi ngosipụta agwa.
Ọ pụtara na ndekọ afọ 2007 nke mmepụta Paris.
O mechara mee ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri Rafiki na mmepụta Madrid nke egwu ahụ.
Site n'afọ 2019 Magudulela rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-eti egwu na Cirque du Soleil na mmepụta Totem.
